page.title: 15OUR VILLAGE POSTMAN
page.content: Our village postman Mr.Edgar Moss gets up at 5.00am each week day and Saturday mornings.He arrives at our sub_post office at 6.15am just as the village post master opens the office. There he waits for the mail van to bring the letters and parcels from Saffron Walden.He then goes into the post office,behind the village shop,where there is a long counter which is marked for the various places in and around the village.Mr.Moss sorts the letters out into his various "walks"and after this he sorts out the parcels. Our postman then loads his bike and begins his first delivery. After the first load he cycles back to the Post Office to load up his bicycle ready for a second delivery farther from the centre of the village.Now that the Postal Authorities allow the sending
